name: TWIN LOGIC STRATEGIES ON BEHALF OF THE INTERNET INFRASTRUCTURE COALITION
description: Trade Association for entities operating the structure supporting the Internet
sampleDescriptions: General trade issues digital trade issues, cross-border data flows, NAFTA and issues related to Sec. 230 of the Communications Decency Act
